nodes.bodyText:
This is a really unfortunate value.  I would prefer to see the UTC time that the DCF session expires at, because that signal, while subject to clock skew, would at least not degrade over the time that the system waits before getting around to displaying it.
But, ignoring that, if this could be a Duration (number of seconds) or an Instant (precise time point) at least we would help people writing calls to this method sort out their parameters.
